DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the value of EarlyCDT-Lung test and CT scan both in lung cancer detection and potential health economic outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: Chest Computed Tomography (CT) Screening Study With Antibody Testing
DOC.detailed_description: EarlyCDT-Lung test and CT scan both for lung cancer detection and potential economic outcomes.
DOC.criteria: Persons 5075 Asymptomatic for lung cancer Current or former (stopped smoking less than 10 years ago) cigarette smokers History of cigarette smoking of at least 20 pack years History of cigarette smoking with a family history of lung cancer which gives an individual a personal risk similar to a smoking history of 20 pk/years (i.e. 1% at 5 years). Mentally competent individuals to sign an informed consent. Healthy enough to undergo pulmonary resection or stereotactic body radiotherapy. A fully informed signed consent form must have been obtained.
